entry.title: ุขู ูุฒุด ูุจูุงฺฏ ููุณ - ุจุฑูุงู ู ุฑุฒ ู ูุณุฌู ุจุฑุง ูุจูุงฺฏ (ูุณู ุช ุฏูู ุจุฎุด ุงูู)

ุชู ูุณูุช ูุจู ุจู ุทูุฑ ฺฉู ูพุฑุฏุงุฎุชู ุฏุฑููุฑุฏ ุงููุงุน ูุจูุงฺฏ ูุง ู ุจูุชุฑู ู ุดูู ูพุฏุง ฺฉุฑุฏู ููุงุณุจ ุชุฑู ููุน ูุจูุงฺฏ ุจุฑุง ูุฑ ุดุฎุต. ุฏุฑ ุงู ูุณูุช ูุตุฏ ุฏุงุฑู ุงูุฏุงู ฺฉู ุฏุฑ ูุณูุช ูุจู ูพุฏุง ฺฉุฑุฏู ุฑุง ููุง ุณุงุฒ ฺฉูู ู ุจุฑุง ูุณุฑ ุทููุงู ฺฉู ุฏุฑ ูพุด ุฏุงุฑู ุจูุด ุฌุฒุฆุงุช ุงุถุงูู ฺฉูู ู ูุณุชูุฏุณุงุฒ ฺฉูู.

ุงูุงู ุฏฺฏู ุจุง ููุถูุน ูุจูุงฺฏ ุฎูุฏ ู ุฌุงูุนู ุฎูุงููุฏฺฏุงูุด ุขุดูุง ุดุฏุฏ ู ุจุงุฏ ุจู ุณูุงู ููู ุชุฑ ูพุงุณุฎ ุจุฏุฏ ฺฉู ฺุฑุง ฺฉ ุฎูุงููุฏู ฺฉู ุจุฑุญุณุจ ุงุชูุงู ูุงุฑุฏ ูุจูุงฺฏ ุดูุง ุดุฏู ุงุณุช ุฏูุจุงุฑู ุฑุฌูุน ฺฉูุฏ. ุดุงุฏ ุจุดู ุงูุฌูุฑ ูพุฑุณุฏ ฺฉู ูุฏู ุดูุง ุงุฒ ุฑุงู ุงูุฏุงุฎุชู ูุจูุงฺฏ ฺ ุจูุฏู ู ฺู ุฏุงุณุชุงู ูุชูุงุฒ ูพุดุชุด ุฏุงุฑุฏุ ุจู ุงู ุณูุงู ูุง ูพุงุณุฎ ุจุฏุฏ ุชุง ฺฉ ุชุตูุฑ ฺฉู ุงุฒ ูุจูุงฺฏุชูู ู ุฏูู ุจุฑุง ุงู ฺฉู ฺฉ ุจุงุฒุฏุฏฺฉููุฏู ุจู ฺฉ ุฏูุจุงู ฺฉููุฏู ูุจูุงฺฏ ุชุจุฏู ุจุดูุฏ ูพุฏุง ฺฉูุฏ.
ุงุฑุงุฆู ุขุณุงูุณูุฑ
ุฏุฑ ุฏูุง ุชุฌุงุฑุช ููููู ูุฌูุฏ ุฏุงุฑุฏ ุจู ูุงู ุงุฑุงุฆู ุขุณุงูุณูุฑ ฺฉู ูฺฏูุฏ: ุชุตูุฑ ฺฉูุฏ ฺฉู ุจุงุฏ ุณุฑูุงู ฺฏุฐุงุฑ ุจุงูููู ุฏุฑ ฺฉ ุขุณุงูุณูุฑ ุงุณุชุงุฏู ุงุฏ. ุชููุง ุดุงูุณ ฺฉู ุฏุงุฑุฏ ุงู ุงุณุช ฺฉู ุจู 30 ุชุง 90 ุซุงูู ุฏุฑ ููุฑุฏ ูุนุงูุช ฺฉููพุงู ุง ูุญุตููุงุช ุฎูุฏ ุงุฑุงุฆู ุง ฺฉูุชุงู ุจุฏูุฏ. ุญุช ุงฺฏุฑ ูุตุฏ ุฏุฑุขูุฏุฒุง ุงุฒ ูุจูุงฺฏ ุฎูุฏุฑุง ูุฏุงุฑุฏ ูพุงุณุฎ ุจู ุงู ุณูุงู ุฎุงู ุงุฒ ูุทู ูุณุช. ุจุฑุง ุงู ฺฉุงุฑ ูุชููุฏ ุงุฒ ุขูู ุงุณุชูุงุฏู ฺฉูุฏ. :)

entry.title: about me
entry.summary: Hi, I'm Shadmehr Vasighi and I'm a programmer .To be a programmerยmostly just means I enjoy learning new stuff and sometimes: I contribute in some enterprise projects , write some tools and softwares and actually teach my knoledges. I spend a lot of my time learning new technologies around programming and reading famous programmers blogs. I love cooking food - specially pastas - , gardening(i had never done before) ,watching movies ,reading books and riding. I found my interest in computer sciense but i curently study electrical engineering , i'm second year university student at this moment. feel free to ask me for contributing in your open source project , hope you Enjoy the blog posts, and please get in touch through any of the links in my header!ย
entry.content:
Hi, I'm Shadmehr Vasighi and I'm a programmer .To be a programmerยmostly just means I enjoy learning new stuffย and sometimes: I contribute in some enterprise projects , write some toolsย and softwares and actually teach my knoledges.

I spend a lot of my time learning new technologies around programming and reading famous programmers blogs.

I love cooking food - specially pastas - , gardening(i had never done before) ,watching movies ,reading books and riding.

  • my goodreads page
  • my imdb list
  • look at my plants in instagramย ย

I found my interest in computer sciense but i curently study electrical engineering , i'm second year university student at this moment.

feel free to ask me for contributing in your open source project , hope you Enjoy the blog posts, and please get in touch through any of the links in my header!

ย
